content.rendered:
Translation Certification

The La Verne IRB requires researchers working with non-English speakers in their study to submit a Translation Certificate completed by their translator. Additionally, this certificate must be completed by a translator certified to translate documents in the language specific to the researcher’s protocol. For more information, please refer to our policy on Translation Certificates here:

Translation Policy and Procedure
